meanings: participate[take part, compete] in a game[match]
regard it as meaningful[important] to participate

vlive.korean: 혹시 이것도 이벤트로 랜덤으로 가져가는 거야? - 참가하는 거... This will be given to a person randomly picked as well? - How do you participate... 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: This will be given to a person randomly picked as well? - How do you participate...

vlive.korean: 아 그런데 심사위원이 참가를 했잖아요? But the judge is in the team. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “셉라면 챌린지③” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: But the judge is in the team.

vlive.korean: 근데 약간... 참가자는 저희인데... But kind of... We are the contestants... 듣기 View video ONEUS : [Full] ONEUS SPECIAL LIVE "FLY WITH US" 1부
vlive.english: But kind of... We are the contestants...

vlive.korean: [3번 참가자] 야 너 나 따라 샀냐? [Participant number 3] Did you follow me? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 술 먹으면 용기가 생기는 법_EP18_[라이크LIKE]
[2번 참가자] 야 너 나 따라 샀냐? [Participant number 2] Did you follow me? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 술 먹으면 용기가 생기는 법_EP18_[라이크LIKE]

examples.korean: Contestants were grouped according to age and ability. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 대회 참가자들은 나이와 능력별로 나뉘었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Contestants were grouped according to age and ability. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He has been an active participant in the discussion. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 (지금까지) 그 토론의 활발한 참가자였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has been an active participant in the discussion. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They raced to a thrilling victory in the relay. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 릴레이에 참가하여 스릴 넘치는 승리를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They raced to a thrilling victory in the relay. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The event is open to all comers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 본 행사는 관심 있는 사람 모두에게 열려 있습니다[관심 있는 사람이면 누구나 참가할 수 있습니다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The event is open to all comers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He’s a talented athlete who competes nationally and internationally. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 국내 및 국제 대회에 참가하는 재능 있는 선수이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He’s a talented athlete who competes nationally and internationally. Add to Wordbook
